name: quereus-workspace
description: Quereus monorepo - Federated SQL query processor inspired by SQLite

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:engine && yarn build:loader && yarn build:store && yarn build:sync && yarn build:ui && yarn build:plugins && yarn build:vscode && yarn build:cli && yarn build:web
scripts.pub:quereus: cd packages/quereus && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:loader: cd packages/plugin-loader && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:store: cd packages/quereus-plugin-store && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:store-leveldb: cd packages/quereus-store-leveldb && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:store-indexeddb: cd packages/quereus-store-indexeddb && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:sync: cd packages/quereus-plugin-sync && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:sync-coordinator: cd packages/sync-coordinator && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:ui: cd packages/shared-ui && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub:cli: cd packages/quoomb-cli && npx bumpp --no-push && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.pub: yarn pub:quereus && yarn pub:loader && yarn pub:store && yarn pub:store-leveldb && yarn pub:store-indexeddb && yarn pub:sync && yarn pub:sync-coordinator && yarn pub:ui && yarn pub:cli
